titleStmt.title: Sundry reasons inducing Major Robert Huntington to lay down his commission. Humbly presented to the Honourable Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Huntington, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Aug. 2. 1648. Robert Huntington.

With an appended note dated 12 Aug. referring to a surreptitious edition published the previous day with aspersions on Huntington's character appended. Variant: an earlier printing, lacking the note; title has misprint "Huntingdon".
This edition has a double rule border and the fifth line of the title page reads: to lay down his Commission.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
